description: Updates the software package configuration. Requires permission to access the UpdatePackageConfiguration and iam:PassRole actions.

parameters.name: versionUpdateByJobsConfig
parameters.description: Configuration to manage job's package version reporting. This updates the thing's reserved named shadow that the job targets. enabled (boolean) --- Indicates whether the Job is enabled or not. roleArn (string) --- The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the role that grants permission to the IoT jobs service to update the reserved named shadow when the job successfully completes.

nested_params.name: enabled
nested_params.description: Indicates whether the Job is enabled or not.

nested_params.name: roleArn
nested_params.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the role that grants permission to the IoT jobs service to update the reserved named shadow when the job successfully completes.

parameters.name: clientToken
parameters.description: A unique case-sensitive identifier that you can provide to ensure the idempotency of the request. Don't reuse this client token if a new idempotent request is required. This field is autopopulated if not provided.
